description: Professional sensory template for premium dark chocolate (60-85% cacao) with expert guidance on key attributes
expertNotes: Focus on cacao origin character, roast development, and mouthfeel evolution. Premium dark chocolate should show complexity without harsh bitterness.

appearance.prompt: Observe the chocolate's visual appeal and quality indicators
appearance.expertTips: A glossy surface and clean snap are hallmarks of well-tempered premium chocolate. Dull appearance or soft texture may indicate storage issues.

aroma.expertTips: Premium dark chocolate should have complex aroma layers. Single-origin chocolates often show distinctive fruity or floral notes based on terroir.

frontMouth.prompt: Assess initial taste impact and texture
frontMouth.expertTips: Well-conched chocolate melts smoothly without grittiness. Initial bitterness should be balanced, not aggressive. Slow, creamy melt indicates high-quality ingredients.

midRearMouth.prompt: Track flavor development and mouthfeel evolution
midRearMouth.expertTips: This is where premium chocolate shows its quality. Look for flavor development beyond simple sweetness - dried fruit, wine notes, spice complexity.

keyAttributes: Dominant notes in finish (cacao, fruit, bitter)
aftertaste.expertTips: Premium dark chocolate should have a long, clean finish. Harsh or metallic aftertaste indicates poor quality or over-roasting. 30+ second finish is typical of high-quality chocolate.

emotionalResponse.prompt: Capture the emotional experience and consumption behavior
emotionalResponse.expertTips: Premium chocolate often evokes slower, more mindful consumption. High moreishness with sophisticated positioning is the ideal combination.

benchmarkInsights: Premium dark chocolate typically scores 7-9/10 on moreishness when well-balanced. Over-bitter products (8+ bitterness) often score below 6/10 on repeat appeal.
categoryTrends: Growing consumer interest in single-origin, high-percentage, and 'bean-to-bar' stories. Flavor complexity increasingly valued over simple sweetness.
